column4: I have a Compaq Presario CQ50-110US and i get a kernel panic every time i try to boot any linux operating system (ubuntu is one of them)--can anyone please help me?
Are there any general troubleshooting steps for solving a hardware based kernel panic?
yes, exchange the defect piece of hardware ;-)
kernel panics can have several reasons. general tips can only be of quite trivial natur like "read the error messages". if you provide the error messages, maybe someone can help you
